title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8B.04 - Crossbuck Assemblies with YIELD or STOP Signs at Passive Grade Crossings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8B.04 - Crossbuck Assemblies with YIELD or STOP Signs at Passive Grade Crossings

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 13. INSERT the following paragraphs: Support: 07A Section 1685 of the New York State Vehicle and Traffic

Law allows the installation of a STOP (R1-1) sign at a highway-rail crossing
only with prior authorization from the New York State Department of

Transportation. Support: 12A Certain commercial motor vehicles, buses, and school
buses are required to stop at all grade crossings in accordance with Section
1171 of the New York State Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8B.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
